subject: Re: Big Fan Here - Let's Collaborate!
description_text:
Hi Ariel!


Thank you so much I would absolutely love to collaborate!


I'm very interested in your Simsonn Plus X Racing Simulation Pedals and the
Simsonn GT2 Racing Simulator Steering Wheel S1.


My address is:

Abigail Rollins

15332 Lookout Road

Apple Valley CA 92307


Phone: 1-760-577-1722


Would it be possible to send me the tracking information once it ships?


I'm absolutely willing to promote any products you send.


Thank you so much,


Legal name: Abigail Rollins (Annika)

conversations.body_text:
Thank you so much for your reply,
I would absolutely love the pedals in black.
That sounds absolutely amazing, thank you so much I’m very excited about
our collaboration!!
Thank you,
Abigail Rollins

On Thu, Nov 6, 2025 at 5:57 PM support@simsonn.com

Hi Abigail Rollins,     Thank you for your message and for your interest in collaborating with us!  We’re really glad to hear that you like our products. Unfortunately, we’re not able to offer directly product sponsorships currently. However, we’d be happy to provide you with an exclusive 30% discount code for your purchase instead — would that work for you?  Looking forward to hearing from you!     Best regards, The Simsonn Team

Thank you so much I’m so excited!!

Abigail Rollins

On Thu, Nov 6, 2025 at 10:50 PM support@simsonn.com
Hi Abigail Rollins,    Thank you for your understanding! You can use this discount code: Black30, but please note it can only be used once.
